answers.answer: It sounds like some sort of neuropathy, which can be caused by a number of different medical issues.DiabetesMSPinched nervesSpinal/disc/neck issuesChemotherapyI'm sure there's more!

question: I have had this horrible burning in my left hand for like 2 days now I was up all last night with it. What could it be I have not been burnt there but it feels like I was?
title: Burning sensation in left hand
